dodgy.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: not working properly or not in good condition
dodgy.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Norton Disk Doctor can perform miracles on a dodgy hard disk.
Simon was rushed to hospital after eating what must have been dodgy prawns.
dodgy.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: seeming to be false, dishonest, or not to be trusted
dodgy.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: One girl thought the men looked dodgy.
dodgy.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: There were a few dodgy moments.
dodgy.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Itâ€™s always a bit dodgy, sacking a manager.
dodgy.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: Some dealers have an inkling which shares are dodgy.
